FuncDef:
The otn command configures an alarm threshold for the signal degradation of an optical transmit unit or optical data unit on an optical transport network (OTN).
The undo otn command restores the default configuration.
By default, the alarm threshold is 7 for the signal degradation of an optical transmit unit and optical data unit on an OTN.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the alarm threshold for the signal degradation of an optical transmit unit.
The value is an integer ranging from 6 to 9. The default value is 7.

Specifies the alarm threshold for the signal degradation of an optical data unit.
The value is an integer ranging from 6 to 9. The default value is 7.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Optical signals degrade during transmission on an OTN. You can run the otn command to configure an alarm threshold. If signal degradation reaches the threshold, the optical transmit unit or optical data unit reports an alarm to the NMS.
Precautions
This command is supported only by the admin VS.
